https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4mAXrnroaUnA4PApJNV9YS9zrso.jpg High school teacher Mary Stauffer and her eight-year old daughter, Beth are held captive for 53 days by an obsessed former student. Based on a true story. Abducted: The Mary Stauffer Story
